title: Strangler fig migration
summary: Incrementally replace legacy flows by routing traffic to new capabilities while legacy continues to run.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Big-bang cutovers fail under operational and dependency complexity.
whenToUse: Legacy platform must stay up during migration
whenNotToUse: The component is small and low-risk to replace outright

gotchas: Hard to prove equivalence without reconciliation
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: Tie routing to domain slices and measure equivalence before expanding cutover.
